title: Marketplace Roundtable #10: The Industrial Metal Opportunity With Joshua Hall
description: Miners can be their own animal in the market, with different production and earnings cycles than many other stocks. Joshua Hall of Industrial Minefinder discusses his unique view on the market, what he sees as misconceptions in the junior miner space, the difference between major miners and other businesses, how to deal with country risk, and a favorite idea.
